page.title: 07CROOKHAM : GROVE FARM
page.content: Grove Farm is a mixed arable farm with a good frontage on to The Street, Crookham Village. This gives excellent access to the farmland and farm shop, which sells fresh produce. The nearby granary is a listed building and is of brick construction. This land has been used for growing hops in the past, but is now primarily used for cereals and as a market garden. A north eastern section of the farm consisting of 20 acres is scheduled for the development of 200 residential homes. There is currently considerable controversy as to which of two access routes should be used for the site.
